::Striker::

Striker walks past into a clearing, sitting down on a rock. With nothing to 
do, he had wandered off, not recieving the messages from the rest of the 
Maximals. He looks around, remembering how he had first landed on this 
planet. Him and his team...

Striker sighs. Prowl was the only one remaining from his group who was alive 
and in action. Him and Prowl. The two most elite members of his elite team. 
Striker's eyes cloud over slightly. Those had been the good old days... He 
and his team, cruising the galaxy in his ship, The Maximal Hope, going on 
various missions for the Maximal elders, meeting interesting bots, saving 
alot of them from Predacon domination.

He remembered when Prowl was first assigned to his group. The Mission was to 
infultrate a Predacon fortification, gaining some data and rescuing a few 
Maximal hostages. With Prowl's planning, they had pulled it off perfectly, 
accidently detonating the fortress in the end...

Striker looks blankly across the clearing, remembering the old days....
